jobDescription: Long Term ContractData AnalystNo Corp. to Corp. or 3rd partyOnsite position.The Expertise We're Looking For Bachelor's or Master's Degree in a technology related field (e.g. Engineering, Computer Science, etc.) required  Excellent understanding of logical and physical data models  Experience in relational databases especially Oracle  Excellent understanding of normalization principles and de-normalization  Experience with conceptual data models  Experience in taking complex business problems and visualizing and simplifying them  Experience using Power designer/Erwin to data model  Experience using a model repository to keep enterprise models updated  Experience in Agile methodologies (Kanban and SCRUM)  Experience with data movement technologies is a plus  Experience developing Rest APIs is a plus  Experience in NoSQL databases especially Cassandra is a plus Will hire and interview off phoneExperience:Minimum of 3+ years' experience in Logical, Physical, Conceptual Data Modelingerwin Data Modeler (Data Governance Tool)Power Design Data ModelingDesired:Willing to work onsite in Boston or Durham.Interview:30 min phone interview.
